message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd find it very valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $110. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a little closer to my original price. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I am able to offer $100 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
